frontmatter.title: Android App Crashed by React Native Maps and Firebase
frontmatter.author: James

markdownRemark.html:
Draft

  • Android app이 계속 뻑뻑 나감
  • Interstitial 광고 한번 보이고 스크린 리프레시 하면 crash
  • Banner는 어쩔때 보이고 어쩔때 안보이고
  • Problem guess 1: Admob caused the issue. (possibly webview?)
  • Problem guess 2: Conflict between Admob and Functions
  • Problem guess 3: Rerendered w/ hardware acceleration?
  • Problem guess 4: (True) Dependency of react native maps and firebase (google services)

https://github.com/react-native-community/react-native-maps/issues/249

https://github.com/invertase/react-native-firebase/issues/2935

https://github.com/invertase/react-native-firebase/issues/2009

https://github.com/react-native-community/lottie-react-native/issues/443
